mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY STORE_ID ORDER BY IND_NO DESC) AS rn FROM INDENT WHERE STATUS = 'B' OR STATUS = 'AB' AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(IND_DATE, 'YYMMDDHHMMSS')) BETWEEN (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) END) AND (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) END) ORDER BY IND_NO DESC) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT STORE_ID FROM (SELECT STORE_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY STORE_ID ORDER BY IND_NO DESC) AS rn FROM INDENT WHERE (STATUS = 'B' OR STATUS = 'AB') AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(IND_DATE, 'YYMMDDHHMMSS')) BETWEEN (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) END) AND (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) END) ORDER BY IND_NO DESC) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT IND_NO, COUNT, TO_CHAR(IND_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') IND_DATE, TOTAL, STATUS, STORE_ID, ING_NO FROM INDENT WHERE STORE_ID = #{id} AND (STATUS = 'B' OR STATUS = 'AB') AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(IND_DATE, 'YYMMDDHHMMSS')) BETWEEN (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-1, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 150000)) END) AND (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HHMMSS')) < 150000 THEN TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) ELSE TO_NUMBER((TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1, 'YYMMDD') || 149999)) END) ORDER BY IND_NO DESC
